Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormality of the eye 90% Abnormality of the skin 90% Alopecia 90% Aplasia/Hypoplasia of the eyebrow 90% Hypotrichosis - X-linked inheritance - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
